content:
## n8n@0.107.0 For a comprehensive list of changes, check out the [commits](https://github.com/n8n-io/n8n/compare/n8n@0.106.0...n8n@0.107.0) for this version.
**Release date:** 2021-02-08 - New nodes - AWS Comprehend - GetResponse Trigger - Peekalink - Stackby - Enhanced nodes - AWS SES: Added Custom Verification Email resource - Microsoft Teams: Added Task resource - Twitter: Added Delete operation to the Tweet resource - Bug fixes - Google Drive: Fixed an issue with the Delete and Share operations - FileMaker: Fixed an issue with the script list parsing - Updated Node.js version of Docker images to `14.15` - Added a shortcut `CTRL + scroll` to zoom
